trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Représente une entrée audio qui est associée à un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Un module de reconnaissance vocale génère des informations sur l’entrée audio dans le cadre de l’opération de reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Pour accéder à l’audio reconnue, utilisez le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propriété ou le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> méthode de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes:
trans-unit.target: Un résultat de reconnaissance peut être produit par les événements suivants et les méthodes de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes :

trans-unit.source: Events:
trans-unit.target: Événements :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Methods:
trans-unit.target: Méthodes :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Un résultat de reconnaissance produit par la reconnaissance vocale émulé ne contient pas d’audio reconnue.

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Pour cet un résultat de reconnaissance, son <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propriété renvoie `null` et son <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> méthode lève une exception.

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur la reconnaissance vocale émulées, consultez le `EmulateRecognize` et `EmulateRecognizeAsync` méthodes de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant gère le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement et des sorties pour les informations de la console sur le fichier audio reconnu qui est associé au résultat de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'emplacement du flux audio d'entrée correspondant au début de l'audio identifié.

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Emplacement du flux audio d'entrée correspondant au début de l'audio identifié.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété fait référence à la position au début de l’expression reconnue dans le flux de données audio généré du périphérique d’entrée.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: En revanche, le `RecognizerAudioPosition` propriété de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes référence la position du module de reconnaissance au sein de son entrée audio.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Ces positions peuvent être différentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [événements de reconnaissance vocale à l’aide de](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propriété obtient l’heure système au début de l’opération de reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant gère le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement et des sorties pour les informations de la console sur le fichier audio reconnu qui est associé au résultat de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la durée du flux audio d'entrée de l'audio identifié.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Durée du flux audio d'entrée de l'audio identifié.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant gère le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement et des sorties pour les informations de la console sur le fichier audio reconnu qui est associé au résultat de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le format de l'audio traité par un moteur de reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Format de l'audio traité par le module de reconnaissance vocale.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant gère le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement et des sorties pour les informations de la console sur le fichier audio reconnu qui est associé au résultat de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Point de départ des données audio à retourner.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Longueur du segment à retourner.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionne et retourne une section de l'audio identifié actuel sous forme de données binaires.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Retourne une sous-section de l'audio identifié, comme défini par <paramref name="audioPosition" /> et <paramref name="duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant crée une grammaire de reconnaissance vocale pour l’entrée de nom, ajoute un gestionnaire pour le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> événement et charge la grammaire dans un module de reconnaissance vocale de dans le processus.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Il écrit ensuite les informations audio pour la partie du nom de l’entrée dans un fichier audio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier audio est utilisé comme entrée pour un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objet, qui lit une expression qui inclut l’enregistrement audio.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" /> define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> et <paramref name="duration" /> définissent un segment audio en dehors de la plage du segment actuel.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: L'audio actuellement reconnue ne contient aucune donnée.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'heure système au début de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Heure système au début de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propriété obtient l’heure système au début de l’opération de reconnaissance, qui peut être utile pour les calculs de temps de latence et les performances.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> propriété obtient l’emplacement de flux audio généré du périphérique d’entrée.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant gère le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement et des sorties pour les informations de la console sur le fichier audio reconnu qui est associé au résultat de la reconnaissance.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Flux qui recevra les données audio.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Écrit l'audio complet dans un flux en tant que données brutes.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Données audio sont écrit dans `outputStream` sous forme binaire.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Aucune information d’en-tête n’est incluse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> méthode utilise le format Wave, mais n’inclut pas l’en-tête Wave.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pour inclure l’en-tête Wave, utilisez le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Flux qui recevra les données audio.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Écrit les données audio dans un flux au format d'onde.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Données audio sont écrit dans `outputStream` au format de Wave, qui inclut un en-tête ressource interchange file format (RIFF).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> méthode utilise le même format binaire, mais n’inclut pas l’en-tête Wave.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant crée une grammaire de reconnaissance vocale pour l’entrée de nom, ajoute un gestionnaire pour le <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> événement et charge la grammaire dans un module de reconnaissance vocale de dans le processus.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Il écrit ensuite les informations audio pour la partie du nom de l’entrée dans un fichier audio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier audio est utilisé comme entrée pour un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objet, qui lit une expression qui inclut l’enregistrement audio.
